queries.name: parameter
res: Information can be passed to functions as a parameter. Parameters act as variables inside the function.

queries.name: array
res: Arrays are used to store multiple values in a single variable

queries.name: operators
res: Operators are used to perform operations on variables and values.

queries.name: array
res: Arrays are used to store multiple values in a single variable

queries.name: bool
res: Boolean data type can store values with two states: true or false

queries.name: string
res: String data type can store text, such as Hello World

queries.name: char
res: Char data type can store single characters, such as 'a' or 'B'

queries.name: double
res: Double data type can store floating point numbers

queries.name: int
res: Int data type can store integers

queries.name: comment
res: Comments can be used to explain C++ code, and to make it more readable, it starts with //

queries.name: cout
res: The cout object, together with the << operator, is used to output value/text

queries.name: cin
res: The cin object, together with the >> operator, is used to input value from the user

queries.name: std
res: std is a standard library so that we can use names for objects and variables from that library

queries.name: iostream
res: iostream is a header file library that lets us work with input and output objects, such as cout

queries.name: header
res: A header file is a file with extension .h which contains C function declarations

queries.name: why
res: C++ is one of the world's most popular programming languages.
C++ can be found in today's operating systems, Graphical User Interfaces, and embedded systems.
C++ is an object oriented language which gives a clear structure to programs and allows code to be reused, lowering development costs.
C++ is portable and can be used to develop applications that can be adapted to multiple platforms.
C++ is fun and easy to learn!

queries.name: compiler
res: A compiler is a special program that processes statements written in a particular programming language and turns them into machine language

queries.name: pop ide
res: Popular IDE's include Code::Blocks, Eclipse, and Visual Studio

queries.name: ide
res: An IDE (Integrated Development Environment) is used to edit AND compile the code.

queries.name: break
res: The break statement can be used to jump out of a loop

queries.name: continue
res: The continue statement breaks one iteration in the loop

queries.name: nested loops
res: Nested loops means an loop inside another loop

queries.name: forloop
res: A for-loop is a control flow statement for specifying iteration, which allows code to be executed repeatedly.

queries.name: dowhile
res: A do-while loop will execute the code block once, before checking if the condition is true, then it will repeat the loop as long as the condition is true

queries.name: while
res: The while-loop loops through a block of code as long as a specified condition is true

queries.name: loop
res: Loops can execute a block of code as long as a specified condition is reached.

queries.name: nestedif
res: Nested if statements means an if statement inside another if statement.

queries.name: ifelse
res: It is used to specify a new condition to test, if the first condition is false

queries.name: switch
res: It is used to specify many alternative blocks of code to be executed

queries.name: else
res: It is used to specify a block of code to be executed, if the same condition is false

queries.name: if
res: It is used to specify a block of code to be executed, if a specified condition is true

queries.name: data type
res: Data types define the type of data a variable can hold

queries.name: public
res: Public Imembers are accessible from outside the class

queries.name: private
res: Private members cannot be accessed from outside the class

queries.name: access specifier
res: Access specifiers define how the members of a class can be accessed

queries.name: constructor
res: A constructor is a member function of a class which initializes objects of a class

queries.name: cpp class
res: A class in C++ is a user-defined type or data structure declared with keyword class that has data and functions as its members

queries.name: main
res: Main function always runs at the start of the program

queries.name: cpp function
res: A function is a block of code which only runs when it is called

queries.name: cpp developer
res: C++ was developed by Danish computer scientist Bjarne Stroustrup

queries.name: cpp def
res: C++ is a general-purpose programming language
